# Jeff Bezos’ rocket company pauses space tourism to focus on the Moon

## Blue Origin said it had a backlog stretching several years of customers wanting a seat on New Shepard.

By: [New York Times](https://indianexpress.com/agency/new-york-times/)

5 min read_New Delhi_Feb 1, 2026 09:44 AM IST
